title: Reading Zen and the Art of Motorcycle Maintenance - Chapter 4
description: I left out an important part in Chapter 3, so I start with this. We explore what you need to take on a long motorcycle trip, how temperaments express themselves on said trip, people's lovable or concerning quirks, and why trying to capture Quality often kills it.
